overview: While filming a love scene, new actor Joon-il goes too far for realism and offends the tantrum prone star actress, Joo-hee. This gets him fired, as well as Duk-ho, the production assistant friend who got Joon-il the job. Unemployed, the two men pull a scam on a fashion model and blow the money. Living on the streets they pull off more scams to survive. While working at a male host bar, they hear of a scandalous video tape of Joo-hee. They track it down and send it to the media to take revenge and ruin her career. Chance has Joon-il soon on his way to the top, but will he stay tight with Duk-ho and what will happened if Joo-hee discovers their sabotage?
title: Idiots and Fools
